snippet: Kittel showed he may be the sprinter to beat, speeding to his second stage win on Monday as cycling’s biggest race entered London before leaving England for France.
abstract: German cyclist Marcel Kittel wins Stage 3 of Tour de France; Italy's Vincenzo Nibali retains overall lead.
lead_paragraph: Kittel showed he may be the sprinter to beat, speeding to his second stage win on Monday as cycling’s biggest race entered London before leaving England for France.

headline.main: Marcel Kittel Wins Stage 3 of Tour de France in London
